Prodigious Pineapple is creating video games for the Nintendo Gameboy. | Patreon

Controls:

Start button = Enter (Pull up menu)
Select button = Shift (See care meters) Hold A button to exit text cycle.
A button = Z ( Select option and cycle through text)
B button = X (Back)
Arrows to navigate

 "Digital Monster Ver. GBs" (working title)

Impulse city edition
Pulsemon evolution roster.

  The games focus is to care for a digital monster. This is primarily done by feeding, training, cleaning up after it and making sure the it gets enough rest. The quality of care given will have an affect on its evolution path.  As time goes on and care requirements are met, the monster will evolve. 

Each monster will have multiple evolution options available to it.  As it stands currently, each version will have 17 monsters. This is subject to change as the final design is decided. 

 List of CURRENT features: 

•Check age, weight, type and level. 
•Give food to suppress hunger.
•Give vitamin to maintain strength.
•Praise monster to increase happiness.
•Scold monster to increase discipline.
•Turn off lights to make monster rest.
•Heal injuries and Cure sickness.
•Maintain cleanliness(delete poop).
•Train monster mini-game.
•Monster death/rebirth into an egg.

 List of PLANNED features: 

 Battles: Similar to training. Each monster will have 2 attacks (chosen from a pool of 3-4 attacks on evolution). Each monster will take turns attacking and blocking. Attack type and Monster type will play into effect. 

 Story mode: travel the digital world. Consists of a series of battles with iconic digital monsters from the original series. 

 Devolution: Allow you to devolve current monster in order to achieve a different evolution path. In the "master" copy this will allow you to devolve into different evolutions.
